Before the election Michael Gove laid out his vision for history teaching: Most parents would rather their children had a traditional education, with children sitting in rows, learning the kings and queens of Henry VIII . Among those Michael Gove has recruited to review the curriculum is that apologist for the British empire, Niall Ferguson . So welcome to the great white, male, ruling-class view of history. Chrysler announced that produced an operating profit in the first quarter of 2010 for the first time since the economic crisis began. It can safely be said that what Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations. Our job is not yet done. We have a lot of work ahead to fulfill our five-year business plan objectives, added Sergio Marchionne . Last year, U.S. Barack Obama made the difficult decision to provide Chrysler with financial support if they proved to be able to restructure their businesses into a long-term viability without ongoing government assistance.

The management reshuffle has been brought about to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt said. Eric Schmidt oversaw a period of tremendous growth as chief executive for the past decade, as Google Inc. turned into a Web search-engine powerhouse with a complementary search-ad business
